title: Simple Machines Make Life Easier for Poor Farmers

tasks.task: Development and Testing of Hand-Held Planting Tool for Small-Scale Farmers
subtasks: Understanding the need for low-cost farming tools for small-scale farmers in developing countries
Designing a hand-held planting tool with a long metal hoe having two flat teeth
Integrating seed planting and fertilizer distribution functions into a single tool
Evaluating previous versions of the tool, such as the hand planter from Brazil
Testing the effectiveness of the tool in reducing planting time, seed, and fertilizer usage
Collaborating with the International Maize and Wheat Improvement Center to refine and improve the tool design
Publishing the tool plans online for widespread dissemination and adoption by small-scale farmers
